description: A high severity event has occurred. Microsoft Defender Antivirus has detected malware or other potentially unwanted software, specifically HackTool:PowerShell/Mimikatz.F. The detection origin is from the local computer and the detection source is Realtime protection. The user associated with the event is NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM.

High severity SIEM alert: Microsoft Defender Antivirus detected malware HackTool:PowerShell/Mimikatz.F on agent_ip 192.168.68.117, which poses a serious threat to the network. The affected user is testuser22.
